explanation: Funds are required to procure an air transportable tactical rinse system. Funding will be realigned from the United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM), Operation and Maintenance,

Funds are available due to the rocket engine technology development congressional add enacted as part of the DoD Appropriations Act, 2022. This add is focused on a space launch application and must be transferred from RDT&E, Air Force appropriation to RDT&E, Space Force appropriation.

Funds provided as a congressional add in the DoD Appropriations Act, 2022, are available because the United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) requirement to procure an air transportable tactical rinse system should be realigned to the USSOCOM Procurement, 22/24, appropriation for proper execution. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item.
